publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1054 Cathie Craigie on behalf of the Audit Committee: Written Agreement on the Form of Accounts and Powers of Directionâ€”That the Parliament notes the written agreement between the Parliament and the Scottish Ministers on the Form of Accounts and Powers of Directions (SP Paper 158) and agrees its terms.
S1M-1054 Written Agreement on the Form of Accounts and Powers of Direction (lodged on 26 June 2000) Mr Jack McConnell*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
